item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I'm never going to accomplish anything; that's perfectly clear to me. I'm never going to be famous. My name will never be writ large on the roster of Those Who Do Things. I don't do anything. Not one single thing. I used to bite my nails, but I don't even do that any more." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales
item.description: "لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است باز من دیوانه ام ، مستم باز می لرزد ، دلم ، دستم باز گویی در جهان دیگری هستم های ! نخراشی به غفلت گونه ام را ، تیغ های ، نپریشی صفای زلفکم را ، دست و آبرویم را نریزی ، دل ای نخورده مست لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است" -- مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī
item.description: "The Earth would die If the sun stopped kissing her." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Nioosha add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "No one has ever become poor by giving." -- Anne Frank
